info.description: Bulk Initiation (BU) is a Temenos Payments Application that allows bank to upload small and medium sized bulk payment files, or manually capture bulk payments in its front office or back offices. The Application can be accessed by online channel applications by the APIs listed in this page to upload or create bulks,  manage and approve them before being sent for payment execution by the bank.
info.title: Bulk Payment Initiation

parameters.name: systemFileName
parameters.description: Contains the system generated name for the uploaded file

parameters.name: uploadId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the uploaded file

parameters.name: userSignOnName
parameters.description: This is the name entered by the User to sign on to the System. It is used by the System as an alternative key to access User details

parameters.name: lastUpdateDate
parameters.description: Specifies the date of last update to the record.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from Transact on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: Identifier of the lead company of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch for the respective contract for customer data protection purposes. Example US0010001.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

parameters.name: disablePagination
parameters.description: Indicates the pagination header attributes availability. If set to 'true', it fetches all the data

get.description: Retrieve bulks based on bulk status or bulk ID

parameters.name: recordStatus
parameters.description: General status of the record. Possible values: - null - authorised - IHLD - input, on hold - INAU - input, not authorised - INA2 - input, authorised, pending second authorisation - INAO - input, not authorised with blocking overrides - RNAU - reversed, not authorised - RNAO - reversed, not authorised with blocking overrides

parameters.name: bulkTypeId
parameters.description: Identifier of the bulk update type record that holds default conditions required for Bulk Master creation. SINGLE and MULTI are two record references used by payment order application for processing payments induced through Bulk Master.

parameters.name: singleOrmultiplePayments
parameters.description: Indicates the batch booking preference of the bulk payment. SINGLE – Single consolidated accounting entry on the debtor account. MULTI – Individual postings per each credit entry

parameters.description: Status code, as defined by the institution

parameters.description: Indicates the sender reference that comes from the inward payment file

parameters.description: The credit value date i.e. tentative date on which the payment system will process the payment

signatories.description: Indicates the authorised signatories for the payments. More applicable in case of corporate payments where multiple signatories are required to sign a payment instruction

signatory.description: The authorised signatories for the payments can be specified here. More applicable in case of corporate payments where multiple signatories are required to sign a payment instruction

rejectionReasons.description: Contains the remarks given for rejection.

returnOrRejectDescription.description: Contains short additional information on the reason why the payment was returned, refunded or rejected.

rejectRemark.description: Contains the remarks given for rejection.

overrides.description: The override message is captured  that was generated at the time of commitment of the transaction to the database.

override.description: The override message is captured  that was generated at the time of commitment of the transaction to the database.

cancellationReasons.description: Contains the remarks given for cancellation.

cancelInitiatedBy.description: Contains the party initiating the payment cancellation. Examples are BANK or CUSTOMER.

cancelRemark.description: Contains the remarks given for cancellation.

errorDetails.description: Error details of the Bundle account

errorDetail.description: Error details of the Bundle account

description.description: Contains the description of purpose of the payment.

bulkTypeId.description: Identifier of the bulk update type record that holds default conditions required for Bulk Master creation. SINGLE and MULTI are two record references used by payment order application for processing payments induced through Bulk Master.

creditOrDebitPayment.description: Indicates whether the Bulk processing is for Credit or Debit Payments. Allowed values are DEBIT, CREDIT.

singleOrmultiplePayments.description: Indicates the batch booking preference of the bulk payment. SINGLE – Single consolidated accounting entry on the debtor account. MULTI – Individual postings per each credit entry

paymentMethod.description: Method chosen to make the payment

processingDate.description: The date when payment instruction is processed in system.

requiredCreditValueDate.description: The credit value date i.e. tentative date on which the payment system will process the payment

clearingDate.description: Contains the date from which the payment is expected and is used to indicate the exposure date for the payment.

uploadId.description: The unique identifier of the uploaded file

debitReference.description: Reference for debit party of a payment transaction

creditReference.description: Reference quoted by the credit account for a payment

statusCode.description: Status code, as defined by the institution

countOfRecords.description: Total count of records information for NOFILE (an enquiry does not exist in a single file) enquiry for online upgrade

errorCount.description: Contains the number of records in error.

currency.description: Identifies the currency. E.g. USD, GBP etc

intermediaryInstitutionAccount.description: Contains the intermediate account which will be used to hold the funds if the bulk processing is set to receive only single debit or credit.

recordStatus.description: General status of the record. Possible values: - null - authorised - IHLD - input, on hold - INAU - input, not authorised - INA2 - input, authorised, pending second authorisation - INAO - input, not authorised with blocking overrides - RNAU - reversed, not authorised - RNAO - reversed, not authorised with blocking overrides

creationDateTime.description: Date and Time of the message creation.

fileUpload.description: Uses a file browser to locate and display the file.

numberOfItems.description: Contains the total number of items, as captured during bulk creation.

bulkReference.description: Contains bulk master reference for the payment.

signatories.description: Indicates the authorised signatories for the payments. More applicable in case of corporate payments where multiple signatories are required to sign a payment instruction
